title: Two-Eyed Seeing-Based Indigenous Science Education Participation Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Mobile device utilization in BYOD environments for professionals’ job-integrated learning needs

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more educational designs that integrate Indigenous knowledge and Western science by applying the TES (Teaching, Empowerment, Sustainability) approach.
Learners develop two or more science education contents reflecting Indigenous cultural contexts in mobile microlearning environments.
Learners present at least once strategies to enhance Indigenous educational participation using the TES assessment framework.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
